title: Team pls
body:
When you decide that you are the carry, you tend to rely on your team more then anyone else but from what I gather in the lower tiers full of toxic tryhards... people go full rambo and end up just using the team as a scapegoat. This is both counter productive and creates a highly negative experience for all players involved, why not play like a team in your next game? (for all players who are like this)

Don't play if you intend to be an abusive ass, rage or blame your team. Period
If you think "I deserve silver/gold/plat, these skrubs are holding me back", then stop.
Take a break
Stop thinking
And spectate a friends' game.
For the whole game do not think anything beyond the immediate game and what they are doing.
Reflect on your thinking, and how you play.

Then tell me that skrubs are holding you back

replies.body: o darn I thought u needed a partnr :(
